name: 智代子
text:
えへへ、みんなありがとね！
お休みの日なのに付き合ってもらっちゃって！
trans: Ehehe, thanks for going shopping with me even though it's our day off!

name: 果穂
text:
みなさんと一緒のお仕事もレッスンも楽しいですけど、
こういうお買い物もスッゴく楽しみです！
trans: We usually get together for work and lessons, but I'm still excited to go shopping with everyone.

name: 果穂
text: 全員集合できたのも嬉しいです！
trans: I'm happy that we were all able to get together so quickly too!

name: 智代子
text:
そうだねぇ。夏葉ちゃんとか忙しそうだし、
一緒に買い出しまでは無理かもって思ってたから……
trans: For sure. Natsuha-chan always seems so busy, so I didn't think that she would be able to come today...

name: 夏葉
text:
あら、そんなことないわよ！
私は予定があればあるほどいいと思ってるし
trans: Of course, I'd come along with you guys! Even if I was busy today, I'd still find a way to fit this into my schedule.

name: 夏葉
text:
だって、引き出しは多い方がいいでしょう？
これも、アイドルとしての務めよ
trans: After all, it is better to have more people for something like this, right? This is just another one of my duties as an idol.

name: 果穂
text: わぁ……！　スゴいですっ、勉強になります……！
trans: Wow...! So cool! I'll make sure to remember this!

name: 智代子
text: 夏葉ちゃんってば真面目だなぁ……！
trans: Natsuha-chan sure takes her job seriously...!

name: 凛世
text:
日々、鍛錬の……ご様子……
敬服……いたします……
trans: I greatly admire... your ability... to commit... to daily training...

name: 智代子
text: そだ、凛世ちゃんも来てくれてありがとうだよ！
trans: Oh yeah, thanks for coming along too, Rinze-chan!

name: 凛世
text:
いえ……
凛世も……楽しみにしておりました……
trans: My pleasure... I too... am looking forward to what you have planned...

name: 凛世
text:
桜餅……
プロデューサーさまにも……召し上がっていただきたく
trans: Sakura mochi... That is something I wish to make... for Producer-sama...

name: 智代子
text:
そっか、凛世ちゃんらしいね……！
喜んでもらえるように頑張ろう！
trans: I see, that's just like you Rinze-chan. Let's all enjoy making them together!

name: 凛世
text: はい、丹精こめて……作ります
trans: I will make sure... to put my heart into...

name: 智代子
text: よーし、しっかり材料を揃えて、バンバン作っちゃうぞー！
trans: Alrighty, let's get all our ingredients and knock these sakura mochi out of the park.

name: 樹里
text:
ふたりとも気合入ってんな……
チョコはやけに機嫌いいし
trans: Well you two are really getting into this... Choco, you're in an especially good mood today too.

name: 智代子
text:
えへへー、それはそうだよ！
だってみんなでお料理なんてさ、女子会っぽいじゃん！
trans: Ehehe, of course I am! With everyone getting together to make snacks, it'll be like our own girls' night out!

name: 果穂
text:
じょしかい……？　あっ、聞いたことあります！
大人の女性の集まりなんですよねっ
trans: Girls' night out...? Oh, I've heard about this before. It's like a grown-up girl get-together, right?

name: 樹里
text:
いや、今日のはそういうんじゃねーだろ？
ちょっとみんなで甘いもの作るだけなんだから
trans: No, isn't this something else altogether? We're just getting together with everyone to make sweets.

name: 智代子
text:
何言ってるの樹里ちゃん！　楽しくお菓子作ってー、
写真を撮ってー、ツイスタに上げる！
trans: What are you saying Juri-chan! We're going to make snacks together, take pictures together, and then post them on Twesta together!

name: 智代子
text:
……ほら、まごうことなき女子会だよ！
放課後クライマックスガールズ休日出張版、みたいな！
trans: If that's not a girl's night out, I don't know what is! Treat it like a Houkago Climax Girls retreat!

name: 樹里
text:
相変わらずツイスタか……投稿すんのはいいけど、
その、加工っつーの？　そういうの、あんますんなよな
trans: Again with Twesta... It's fine if you want to post about it, but I don't really know how to add filters and other stuff like that.

name: 智代子
text:
あはは、ちょこっとキラキラさせたりとか、
それくらいだから安心してってば！
trans: Ahaha, I usually just like adding sparkles and chocolate to my pictures. Those are pretty simple to use!

name: 果穂
text:
あのっ、ちょこ先輩っ！
あたしも、みんなでたくさん写真撮りたいです！
trans: Choco-senpai, I also wanna take a lot of pictures of us!

name: 果穂
text: キラキラもさせたいです！
trans: And then I want to make the pictures all sparkly!

name: 智代子
text:
いいよいいよ！　たくさん撮ろう！
全部ツイスタに上げなくてもさ、思い出だし！
trans: Go ahead, go ahead! Take as many as you can! You can post as many as you want on Twesta yourself!

name: 果穂
text: はいっ！
trans: Alright!

name: 凛世
text:
ふふ……
甘味を作るだけでは、終わらないようですね……
trans: Fufu... So, we shall not be ending it with just making sweets...

name: 樹里
text:
そうなっちまったな
……チョコも果穂も、はしゃぎすぎて目的見失うなよ？
trans: It seems as if it's just become that way. Choco, Kaho, don't mess around too much and forget our main goal here.

name: 智代子
text:
うん、みんなで楽しく桜餅、だもんね！　わかってるよ！
それじゃあ、お買い物へしゅっぱ～つ！
trans: Yeah. We're here to make sakura mochi with everyone! I got it, I got it! Alright everyone, let's head on out!

name: 智代子
text: ──ってあれ、夏葉ちゃんは？
trans: Wait a sec, where's Natsuha-chan?

name: 凛世
text: あちらに……
trans: Over there...

name: 智代子
text: ええっ！？　夏葉ちゃん！？
trans: What the heck!? Natsuha-chan!?

name: 樹里
text: 遠っ！　いつの間にあんな……
trans: When did she get so far...

name: 智代子
text:
夏葉ちゃーんっ、ちょっと待ってー！
進むの速いよー！？
trans: Wait up, Natsuha-chan! You walk much faster than we do!

name: 夏葉
text:
ただお店に向かうだけじゃもったいないわー！
正しい姿勢で速く歩けば、トレーニングになるでしょー！？
trans: It's not enough to just go to the store! If you walk quickly with perfect posture, then even a trip to the supermarket can become training!

name: 夏葉
text:
ほら、みんなー！
置いていくわよー！
trans: Come on everyone! I'll leave you guys behind at this rate!

name: 果穂
text:
わわっ……！　夏葉さん、もう見えなくなっちゃいます！
追いかけないとです！
trans: Woah! We almost can't see Natsuha-san anymore! We gotta hurry after her!

name: 樹里
text: いいけどよ……凛世、急げるか？
trans: I'm fine, but... Rinze, can you keep up?

name: 凛世
text: はい……参ります……
trans: Yes... Let us go forth...

name: 智代子
text:
よし、じゃあみんな行こっか！
──夏葉ちゃーん、今行くから待っててー！
trans: Then, let's go everyone! Natsuha-chan, we're coming now so slow down for a bit!

name: 樹里
text: ……買い忘れ、ないよな？
trans: ...Did we forget to buy anything?

name: 智代子
text: えっと、あずきでしょ、お砂糖でしょ、食紅でしょ
trans: Let me check. We have azuki, sugar, and our red food coloring.

name: 凛世
text: こちらに、白玉粉も……
trans: And the sweet rice flour is here...

name: 夏葉
text:
桜の葉の塩漬けもあるし、これで完璧ね
見つかってよかったわ
trans: And here are the salted sakura leaves. With this, we got everything. I'm glad we were able to find everything without any problems.

name: 智代子
text: 結構探し回っちゃったもんね～
trans: We did do a lot of searching today～

name: 夏葉
text:
ふふっ、そうね
これも努力の果てに結果が待っているということの表れだわ
trans: Fufu, that's true. It really shows that effort never goes unrewarded.

name: 夏葉
text:
さ、事務所まで急ぎましょう！
これ以上遅くなってしまってもいけないし
trans: Let's keep it up and hurry back to the office! After all that, we definitely can't slow down now!

name: 樹里
text: また早歩きか？　……ま、いいけどよ
trans: We're still running? Well, whatever.

name: 凛世
text: あの……
trans: Excuse me...

name: 樹里
text: どうした？
trans: What's up?

name: 凛世
text: 果穂さんが……お疲れのようです……
trans: It would appear that... Kaho-san has grown tired...

name: 果穂
text: ……あっ、よ、呼びました……？
trans: ...Ah. D-Did someone say my name...?

name: 智代子
text: ありゃ。果穂、眠い？　大丈夫？
trans: Huh? Kaho, are you sleepy? Are you still feeling fine?

name: 果穂
text:
は、はいっ、なんでもないです……！
全然……へっちゃら……で、す……
trans: Y-Yes, I'm fine...! No... big deal... at all...

name: 樹里
text: なんでもあるだろ。今にも寝そうだぞ、大丈夫か？
trans: What do you mean "no big deal"? Are you sure you're fine? It looked like you were about to pass out.

name: 果穂
text:
……はっ！　あ、いえそのっ！　大丈夫ですから！
早く帰って、桜餅作りましょうっ！
trans: ...Huh! Ah, no, I mean! I'm fine! Let's just hurry back and make some sakura mochi!

name: 夏葉
text: いいえ、無理をしてはだめ。今日はゆっくり休むわよ
trans: No, that won't do at all. Let's call it a day for now.

name: 夏葉
text:
アナタが本調子じゃないのなら、
みんなで楽しく桜餅は作れないもの。違う？
trans: If you're not feeling well, then everyone cannot help but worry about you. We definitely cannot make sakura mochi that way, am I wrong?

name: 果穂
text: で、でも……！
trans: B-But...!

name: 夏葉
text:
桜餅は逃げないわ。もちろん私たちもね
こういう時は、果穂の体調を優先するべきよ
trans: The sakura mochi won't be going anywhere and neither will we. Right now, it's far more important to focus on your well-being.

name: 樹里
text: ……だな。桜餅はまた次の楽しみに取っておこうぜ
trans: For sure. We can have fun making sakura mochi another time.

name: 智代子
text:
私もそれに賛成かなっ。ほら、ヒーロー番組でも、
盛り上がるところはまた次回！　ってなるでしょ？
trans: I'm with you two there. It's just like your favorite superhero show, right? There'll always be next time.

name: 凛世
text:
ふふ……
次回が……楽しみです……
trans: Fufu... Until then... I'll have something to look forward to...

name: 果穂
text: うぅ……みなさん……すみません……
trans: Sniff... Everyone... I'm sorry...

name: 智代子
text:
大丈夫だってば！
事務所に戻ったら、今度の予定、立てようね？
trans: We've already said it's going to be alright! When we return to the office, you want to set up our plans for next meetup?

name: 果穂
text: ──はいっ、ありがとうございます！
trans: ──Yes, thank you very much!
